    <sys_script_include action="INSERT_OR_UPDATE">
        <access>package_private</access>
        <active>true</active>
        <api_name>global.DemandCoreTokyoUpgradeHelper</api_name>
        <caller_access/>
        <client_callable>false</client_callable>
        <description/>
        <name>DemandCoreTokyoUpgradeHelper</name>
        <script><![CDATA[var DemandCoreTokyoUpgradeHelper = Class.create();
DemandCoreTokyoUpgradeHelper.prototype = {
    initialize: function() {
    },
    updateReferenceQualifierOnDemand: function(fieldName){
		try{
			var gr = new GlideRecord('sys_dictionary');
			gr.addQuery('name', 'dmn_demand');
			gr.addQuery('element', fieldName);
			gr.query();
			if(gr.next()) {
				if(fieldName == 'department'){
					if(gr.getValue('reference_qual') && gr.getValue('reference_qual').indexOf('DemandMgmtDataSeparationUtil.getActiveDepartmentIdsForDemand') != -1){
						gr.setValue('reference_qual', "javascript: current.business_unit ? 'business_unit=' + current.business_unit : ''");
						gr.setWorkflow(false);
						gr.update();
						gs.log('Reference qualifier of '+fieldName+' on demand table has been updated');
					}
					else {
						gs.log('Reference qualifier of '+fieldName+' on demand table has been defined already and hence not upgrading');
					}
				}
				else if(fieldName == 'business_unit'){
					if(gr.getValue('reference_qual') && gr.getValue('reference_qual').indexOf('DemandMgmtDataSeparationUtil.getActiveBusinessUnitIdsForDemand') != -1){
						gr.setValue('reference_qual', '');
						gr.setWorkflow(false);
						gr.update();
						gs.log('Reference qualifier of '+fieldName+' on demand table has been updated');
					}
					else {
						gs.log('Reference qualifier of '+fieldName+' on demand table has been defined already and hence not upgrading');
					}
				}
			} 
			else {
				gs.log(fieldName+' on demand table doesn not exist');
			}
		}
		catch (err){
			gs.log('Error occurred in updating reference qualifier on '+fieldName+': '+err);
		}		
	},
	updateDefaultValueOnDemand: function(fieldName){
		try{
			var gr = new GlideRecord('sys_dictionary');
			gr.addQuery('name', 'dmn_demand');
			gr.addQuery('element', fieldName);
			gr.query();
			if(gr.next()) {
				if(gr.getValue('default_value') && gr.getValue('default_value').indexOf('DemandMgmtDataSeparationUtil') != -1){
					if(fieldName == 'business_unit'){
						gr.setValue('default_value', '');
					}
					else if(fieldName == 'department'){
						gr.setValue('default_value', '');
					}
					gr.setWorkflow(false);
					gr.update();
					gs.log('Default value of '+fieldName+' on demand table has been updated');
				}
				else {
					gs.log('Default value of '+fieldName+' on demand table has been defined already and hence not upgrading');
				}
			} 
			else {
				gs.log(fieldName+' on demand table doesn not exist');
			}
		}
		catch (err){
			gs.log('Error occurred in updating default value on '+fieldName+': '+err);
		}
	},
    type: 'DemandCoreTokyoUpgradeHelper'
};]]></script>
